entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 p.m. MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 4:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: -15.9°C

Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -28

Wind: NE 32 km/h gust 51 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023
